page.title: 09Arbroath, library.
page.content: Today we went to the library and interviewd the librarian whose name was Alistair Sutherland.This was not the first library there has been in Arbroath. The first one was beside the Sheriff Court in the High Sreet . The present library has recently been modernised and a computer installed. Mr.Sutherland said that books and music on tapes had brought more custom.He also said that more people than ever were using the library.the busiest day is Saturday and some times Tuesday.There are about 10,000 members of the library. We also asked him if there was any problems with vandals or many books lost or stolen.He said very little compared with big cities.
